title: Woah woah woah Mister Rito
body: Now we have boards, where are the Season 4 Forum Badges supposed to go huh? huh?

replies.body: Season 4 badges will be here! Also we will have seasons 1-3 updated on Boards as well, soon!
Just like our OCE Skin right???

Go back to NA. I thought this was boards.oce
http://lh3.ggpht.com/-ErMyKHGB8_4/U4K-5LvQGnI/AAAAAAAAABc/_aFHW5Pb3Nc/kappa%252520mikey.jpg

You guys can post on NA Boards, and we can post on yours! ;)

http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/122/c/3/deal_with_it__rammus__by_shadowraptor89-d7gurgv.jpg
How come it says wrong user and pass when I log in to NA boards?
Tamat! I met you at NZ Armageddon. Totes fan boyed.
Nice dude! That must have been right before I got really sick. I missed the last day of Armageddon. :(

Make one for Silver as well so I can trash talk bronzies kappa

Also, can we have a kappa emoticon here?
Yes, this would be a {{champion:104}} problem if badges weren't displayed.
oh thank god, I'd be pissed if I didn't get to show off my shiny gold badge.
